casebody.data:
Before Truax, P. J., and Dugro, J.

Albert Borrill, Appellant, v. Minnie Barton, Respondent. Appeal from a judgment of the Municipal Court of the city of New York, tenth district, borough of Manhattan. William Henry Knox, for appellant; G. A. C. Barnett, for respondent. Judgment reversed and new trial ordered, with costs to appellant to abide the event.

No opinion.
